Events.Text: My name is Mark and I would like to schedule a two-hour meeting with George for Thursday at 7 pm. The meeting reason is 'weekly scrum planning'.
Hi Mark! Just give me a moment while I put all of that information into the system.

Events.Text: Fantastic, your meeting with George has been successfully scheduled for Thursday, 7 pm-9 pm.

Scenario.UserTask: Your are Mark and would like to schedule a two-hour meeting with George for Thursday at 7 pm. The meeting reason is 'weekly scrum planning'. If that time does not work, you can also do 6 pm or 9 pm the same day.
Scenario.WizardTask: Help the user schedule a meeting!

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the AI Assistant schedule your meeting?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
